name: Gadawere.ge - First Georgian Paraphrasing Tool
about: Gadawere.ge is a website with over 5000 users allowing the user to paraphrase given Georgian text in the matter of seconds. The project is open-source and completely free for every user. It is the one of the first and the first paraphraser tool that processes Georgian Language.

name: AI Image Generator Website
about: Full-Stack AI Image Generation and community showcase website using React, MongoDB, Express, Tailwind, Cloudinary, OpenAI, File-Saver.

name: Jobs API
about: REST API that provides information about current job openings on the Georgian job market jobs.ge. The API returns data in JSON format and includes details such as the job title, date posted, date until, job description, and an optional company logo.

name: the.weather | Weather Forecast
about: Responsive weather forecast app using ReactJs, Axios, Meteo API and Geocoding API. Inspired by https://dribbble.com/thearthurk.

name: Spend Bidzinas Money
about: My Georgian version of popular website https://neal.fun/spend/. The application was written in ReactJs with use of React Hooks and JSON for storing data.

name: React Ecommerce Website
about: Ecommerce website created using React. The website functions based on React Hooks, Apollo Client and Graphql Endpoint.

name: Meme Generator Website
about: Random meme generator website created using React. The websites functions based on React Hooks, React Forms, Random Meme API and htmlcanvas Library.

name: Simple PHP CRUD
about: CRUD APP using vanilla PHP, HTML, CSS and JS.

name: Delivery Service Management App
about: The application was written with Java, Firebase Realtime Database, and Material Design to ensure user-friendly UI/UX. To learn more please reference Documentation from either HTML page or from directory.

name: Parking Management App
about: The application was written with Java, Firebase Realtime Database / Cloud Messaging, and Material Design to ensure user-friendly UI/UX. To learn more please reference Documentation from either HTML page or from directory.
